body:
I could be just missing the point entirely, but it looks as though the Tribal Mono and Ability Mono generators require an additional color selection.

Both are defaulting to black, which I'm assuming is because '{B}' is the first color alphabetically. Either that or something's going on with the RNG.
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Deck Generators

comments.body: Might be worth re-opening Issue 446 - see comment #6.
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

content:
_From [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/) on September 14, 2014 12:05:16_

I could be just missing the point entirely, but it looks as though the Tribal Mono and Ability Mono generators require an additional color selection.

Both are defaulting to black, which I'm assuming is because '{B}' is the first color alphabetically. Either that or something's going on with the RNG.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=691_
